mapper.update: update ESTATE_OWNER_DETAIL set owner_name = #{owner_name},owner_mobile = #{owner_mobile},owner_idcard = #{owner_idcard},owner_status = #{owner_status},owner_family = #{owner_family},owner_level = #{owner_level},owner_bank_account = #{owner_bank_account},owner_bank_name = #{owner_bank_name},owner_bank_branch = #{owner_bank_branch},owner_remark = #{owner_remark},owner_email = #{owner_email} where owner_id = #{owner_id}
mapper.select: select * from ESTATE_OWNER_DETAIL where (owner_name like concat('%', #{owner_name},'%') or owner_mobile like concat('%', #{owner_mobile},'%') or owner_idcard like concat('%', #{owner_idcard},'%')) order by owner_id desc

select count(*) as count from ESTATE_OWNER_DETAIL where (owner_name like concat('%', #{owner_name},'%') or owner_mobile like concat('%', #{owner_mobile},'%') or owner_idcard like concat('%', #{owner_idcard},'%'))

select * from ESTATE_OWNER_DETAIL where (owner_name like concat('%', #{owner_name},'%') or owner_mobile like concat('%', #{owner_mobile},'%') or owner_idcard like concat('%', #{owner_idcard},'%')) order by owner_id desc limit ${m}, ${n}

select a.*,b.*,c.*, (select d.code_content from ESTATE_CODE_DETAIL d where a.house_status=d.code_id) as house_status_text, (select d.code_content from ESTATE_CODE_DETAIL d where c.owner_level=d.code_id) as owner_level_text, (select d.code_content from ESTATE_CODE_DETAIL d where a.house_sort=d.code_id) as house_sort_text, (select s.client_id from T_USER_EXTEND s where c.owner_id = s.owner_id) as clientid from ESTATE_HOUSE_DETAIL a,ESTATE_OWNER_HOUSE_DETAIL b,ESTATE_OWNER_DETAIL c where c.status='0' and a.house_id=b.house_id and b.owner_id=c.owner_id and (c.owner_name like concat('%', #{owner_name},'%') or c.owner_mobile like concat('%', #{owner_mobile},'%') or c.owner_idcard like concat('%', #{owner_idcard},'%')) and a.building_id=#{building_id} and a.house_dong=#{dong} order by c.owner_id desc limit ${m}, ${n}
mapper.update: update ESTATE_OWNER_HOUSE_DETAIL set garage_start_date=#{garage_start_date},contract_time=#{contract_time},house_time=#{house_time},decorate_time=#{decorate_time}, live_time=#{live_time} where id=#{id}

update ESTATE_OWNER_HOUSE_DETAIL set live_name=#{live_name},live_mobile=#{live_mobile},live_idcard=#{live_idcard},owner_relation=#{owner_relation}, living_email=#{living_email} where house_id=#{house_id}
update ESTATE_OWNER_DETAIL set status=#{status} where owner_id=#{owner_id}
mapper.select: select * from ESTATE_OWNER_DETAIL where owner_name = #{owner_name} and owner_mobile = #{owner_mobile} and owner_idcard = #{owner_idcard} order by owner_id desc

SELECT e.*,o.house_id from ESTATE_HOUSE_DETAIL h JOIN ESTATE_OWNER_HOUSE_DETAIL o ON o.house_id = h.house_id JOIN ESTATE_OWNER_DETAIL e ON o.owner_id = e.owner_id WHERE h.building_id = #{building_id} and h.house_dong = #{house_dong} and h.house_location = #{house_location}
update ESTATE_OWNER_DETAIL set money = #{money} where owner_id = #{owner_id}

SELECT DISTINCT e.estate_id, e.estate_name, b.building_name, h.*, oh.owner_id FROM ESTATE_INFO_DETAIL e, ESTATE_BUILDING_DETAIL b, ESTATE_HOUSE_DETAIL h, T_USER_EXTEND u, ESTATE_OWNER_HOUSE_DETAIL oh WHERE e.estate_id = b.estate_id AND b.building_id = h.building_id AND oh.house_id = h.house_id AND oh.owner_id = u.owner_id AND u.user_id = #{user_id}
